channel.title: Where can I get 508 stuff?
channel.description: I have not been here for months and I do not know where to start! Lol.

item.title: Where can I get 508 stuff?
item.dc:creator: @Kalphiter Kalphiter
item.description:
@Kalphiter wrote:

First post: October 05, 2008, 07:39:34 pm
My reg date: February 23, 2008, 10:24:13 pm

How do you get this:

“Also, you haven’t been here for months? Then why does your profile say you registered in February?”

And I left Aug 31 and posted Oct 5 after that. Still, what do you mean February?

Read full topic

item.title: Where can I get 508 stuff?
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“Kalphiter, post:4, topic:235201”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=310164.msg2476152#msg2476152 date=1223257312]
Download the 508 server and client, put the cache into your c drive (if your on windows, and your not using a comp that uses something like f drive instead of c), and make sure you have the server running before the client. Also, you haven’t been here for months? Then why does your profile say you registered in February?
[/quote]Excuse me, what calendar are you in?[/quote]
It says the date you registered on your profile page…

Read full topic
